title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.5 - Composition of arbitration committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 328.5 - Composition of arbitration committee

State Regulations
(a) In accordance with subdivision (2) of
section
13-g
of the Workers' Compensation Law, an arbitration committee shall comprise one
physician designated on behalf of the claimant physician by the president of
the medical society, one physician designated on behalf of the carrier by the
rating board and one physician designated by the chairman, Workers'
Compensation Board. The carrier may name an arbitrator of its own selection in
any particular case, the nomination to be made through the rating board. The
arbitrators designated by the rating board and the chairman, Workers'
Compensation Board, shall be members of the Medical Society of the State of New

York. (b) The arbitrator designated
by the chairman, Workers' Compensation Board, shall serve as chairman of the
committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
328.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
